title: Qualitative Phenomenological Approach Design for ICT Integration in Early Childhood Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic early childhood education theory and fundamental ICT skills
context.additional_context: Targeting prospective early childhood educators or career-preparatory students: Focus on exploring ICT integration strategies applicable to real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three educational application cases of ICT tools in early childhood education contexts.
Learners can design a framework interpreting teachers’ ICT integration experiences using qualitative phenomenological research methods.
Learners can plan and propose implementation strategies for BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)-based blended learning activities in large-class environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
